#### Local Neighborhood Events

We try to keep these events close by, virtual, and free or very low cost to keep them accessible for the majority of people.

This calendar stays up to date with the corresponding Google Calendar regardless of the publish date of the website. If you would like to be involved in adding events to this calendar, please reach out and you can be added as an editor.
